name: Boundless Salvation
description:
Casting Flash of Light on targets affected by Tyr's Deliverance extends the duration of your Tyr's Deliverance by 2.5 sec.

Casting Holy Light on targets affected by Tyr's Deliverance extends the duration of your Tyr's Deliverance by 5.0 sec.

Tyr's Deliverance can be extended up to a maximum of 50 sec.
